title: Pixel 3xl is having mic issue.not at all audible to other side of the call while on speaker phone
content:
Pixel 3xl is having mic issue.not at all audible to other side of the call while on speaker phone

Please help in this.
We won't use speaker phones while on office hours.
Only after this work from home , we started using speaker phones. Then we got identified this mic issue.

There is no issue with normal call without speaker turned on
Please advice on this. Can I get a replacement?
I bought phone on September 2019
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
